title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document all necessary requirements for the LegalAIAssistant, including features, functionalities, and user stories.

title: Design LegalAIAssistant Architecture
description: Create a high-level and detailed design for the LegalAIAssistant, including frontend, backend, and database components.

title: Develop Frontend Interface
description: Implement the user interface for the LegalAIAssistant, ensuring it is intuitive, accessible, and user-friendly.

title: Develop Backend Services
description: Implement the backend services for the LegalAIAssistant, including AI models for case law analysis and document drafting.

title: Establish Database Schema and Integrations
description: Create the database schema for storing case law, user information, and other relevant data, as well as integrating with external APIs and services.

title: Perform Quality Assurance Tests
description: Test the functionality and usability of the LegalAIAssistant, ensuring that all features work as intended and addressing any issues that arise.

title: Deploy LegalAIAssistant to Production Environment
description: Prepare the LegalAIAssistant for deployment, including setting up necessary infrastructure, configuring environment variables, and performing any final testing.

title: Conduct Security Audit and Remediation
description: Review the LegalAIAssistant for potential security vulnerabilities, addressing any issues that are found.
